to remember that what's important to

having said that when children do know
about the news one of the most important
and sometimes the most difficult things
that parents can do is to listen to what
their children are thinking about and
listening and asking what their
questions are what their thoughts are
what their feeling about it offers kids
of any age an opportunity to organize
their thoughts and feelings rather than
parents often as we do assuming the
burden of making everything better first
we need to find out what's on our kids
finds so as simple as it sounds
if the issue comes up listening to what
our children's thoughts are is the best

well intended as it is meant to be winds
